pages.text: The goal of the second simulation is to get the $(item)Blessing of the Gods$() to produce $(item)Machines$().$(br2)We as a people never did manage to create $(item)Advanced Technology$() without a little push from the $(item)Gods$().

pages.title: Portal Stone
pages.text: Worship the $(item)Old Gods$() and the $(item)Gods among the stars$() and they will reward you with the gift of $(item)Technology$().$(br2)The $(item)Portal Stone$() can only be acquired after attaining ores from the $(l:sim_2/9_voidgazing)Void$().
